subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
; river
: Probably related to {{cog|qfa-kms-pro|*Ɂnjaᴬ||river}}, whence {{cog|kmc|nyal||river}}, {{cog|swi|qnyal}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).
; “you”
: From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*na-ŋ||you}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|汝水:a river in Henan province|汝南|汝州|汝南月旦|汝墳|汝窯|汝輩|爾汝|爾汝之交|笑罵從汝|汝好:lí hó}}

subSections.title: Readings
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|い}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=い|-}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref> Possibly cognate with {{cog|ko|이#Etymology_4|이|this person}}.

subSections.title: Pronoun
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|pronoun|い}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=い|derogatory}} {{n-g|second person pronoun}}: [[you]]
#* 712: [[w:Kojiki|Kojiki]] (page 156)
#*: 大久米命二人、召兄宇迦斯罵詈云、'''伊'''賀<small>此二字以音</small>所作仕奉於大殿内者、意禮<small>此二字以音</small>先入、明白其將爲仕奉之状而[...]

subSections.title: Etymology 2
Pronoun
Etymology 3
Pronoun
Usage notes
subSections.text: More honorific than ''mashi''. Less honorific than ''mimashi''.

subSections.title: Etymology 4
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|みまし}}

Compound of {{prefix|ja|sort=みまし|御|tr1=mi|pos1=honorific prefix|汝|tr2=mashi|t2=you}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> Also analyzable as a shift in meaning of {{m|ja|御座|tr=mimashi}}, an honorific term of address or reference used for [[nobility]].<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

subSections.title: Pronoun
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|pronoun|みまし}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=みまし|obsolete|honorific}} {{n-g|second person pronoun}}: [[you]]
#* 797: [[w:Shoku Nihongi|Shoku Nihongi]] (edict #5)
#*: 藤原宮<small>爾</small>天下所知'''美麻斯'''<small>乃</small>父<small>止</small>坐天皇<small>乃</small>'''美麻斯'''<small>爾</small>賜<small>志</small>天下之業<small>止</small>詔大命<small>乎</small>聞食恐<small>美</small>受賜懼<small>理</small>坐事<small>乎</small>衆聞食宣。可久賜時<small>爾</small>'''美麻斯'''王<small>乃</small>齡<small>乃</small>弱<small>爾</small>[...]吾子'''美麻斯'''王<small>爾</small>授賜[...]
#* 797: [[w:Shoku Nihongi|Shoku Nihongi]] (edict #51)
#*: '''美末斯'''大臣<small>乃</small>萬政總以<...> 彌麻之大臣之家内子等<small>乎母</small><...>'''美麻之'''大臣<small>乃</small>罷道<small>母</small>[...]
#* 797: [[w:Shoku Nihongi|Shoku Nihongi]] (edict #52)
#*: 大命坐詔<small>久</small>'''美麻斯'''大臣<small>乃</small>仕奉來狀<small>波</small>[...]

subSections.title: Etymology 5
Pronoun
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|pronoun|な}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=な|obsolete}} {{n-g|second person pronoun}}: [[you]]
#* 712: [[w:Kojiki|Kojiki]] (poem #5)
#*: 夜知富許能 加微能美許登夜 阿賀淤富久迩奴斯 '''那'''許曾波 遠迩伊麻世婆 宇知微流 斯麻能佐岐邪岐 加岐微流 伊蘇能佐岐淤知受和加久佐能 都麻母多勢良米 阿波母與 賣迩斯阿禮婆 '''那'''遠岐弖遠波那志 '''那'''遠岐弖 都麻波那斯 [...]
#* 720: [[w:Nihon Shoki|Nihon Shoki]] (poem #90)
#*: 飫裒枳瀰能 耶陛能矩瀰哿枳 哿哿梅騰謀 '''儺'''嗚阿摩之耳彌 哿哿農倶彌柯枳
#* {{RQ:Man'yōshū|14|3353}}
#*: 阿良多麻能 伎倍乃波也之尓 '''奈'''乎多弖天 由伎可都麻思自 移乎佐伎太多尼
#* {{RQ:Man'yōshū|14|3468}}
#*: 夜麻杼里乃 乎呂能波都乎尓 可賀美可家 刀奈布倍美許曽 '''奈'''尓与曽利鶏米
#* c. 920: ''Azuma Asobi Uta'' (#2)
#*: 衣 和賀世古加 介左乃古止天者 奈奈川乎乃 也川乎乃古止乎 之良部 太留古止也 '''奈'''乎加介也末乃 可川乃介也 乎々々々
# {{lb|ja|sort=な|obsolete}} {{n-g|first person pronoun}}: [[I]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=な|obsolete}} {{n-g|self-referential pronoun}}: [[one]], [[oneself]]
#* c. 759: ''{{w|Man'yōshū}} poem 1755 (text [http://jti.lib.virginia.edu/japanese/manyoshu/Man9Yos.html#1755 here])
#*: {{lang|ja|鴬之 生卵乃中尓 霍公鳥 獨所生而 '''己'''父尓 似而者不鳴 己母尓 似而者不鳴}}
#*: {{lang|ja|うぐひすの かひごのなかに ほととぎす ひとりうまれて '''な'''がちちに にてはなかず}}
#*: ''Inside a warbler's egg, a cuckoo was born, but it looked like '''its own''' father and did not sing...''

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|汝|なれ}}: [[you]] (see below)
* {{ja-r|汝|なむち}}: [[you]] (see below)
* {{ja-r|汝|なむぢ}}: [[you]] (see below)
* {{ja-r|汝|なんじ}}: [[you]] (see below)
{{der-mid}}
Also appears in some ancient compound terms with a sense of {{m|en|I}}, {{m|en|my}}.
* {{ja-r|汝%弟|な%おと}}: my younger brother
* {{ja-r|汝%夫|な%せ}}: my man, my husband
* {{ja-r|汝%妹|な%にも}}: my younger sister
* {{ja-r|汝%姉|な%ね}}: my older sister
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 6
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|なれ}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=なれ|-}}. The long form of {{m|ja|汝|tr=na}} above. Compound of {{m|ja|汝|tr=na}} and suffix {{m|ja|れ|tr=re}}.

subSections.title: Pronoun
Etymology 7
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|なむち}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=なむち|-}}. Compound of {{compound|ja|sort=なむち|汝|tr1=na|t1=you|貴|tr2=muchi|t2=noble}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>
